languages.text: Пластины керамита защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 5 с каждой стороны и уменьшая урон от внутренних пожаров на 50%.

traits.locale_text: Пластины керамита защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 5 с каждой стороны и уменьшая урон от внутренних пожаров на 50%.

languages.text: Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} by −50%.
languages.original_text: Пластины керамита защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 5 урона с каждой стороны и уменьшая урон от внутренних пожаров на 50%.

traits.locale_text: Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by internal fires by −50%.
Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} by −50%.
Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} by −50%.

languages.text: Seramit kaplama, tüm taraflarda 5'er puanlık hasarı yadsıyarak ve {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}iç yangınlardan{/g} alınan hasarı %50 azaltarak gemiyi zarar görmekten korur.
languages.original_text: Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} by −50%.

traits.locale_text: Seramit kaplama, tüm taraflarda 5'er puanlık hasarı yadsıyarak ve iç yangınlardan alınan hasarı %50 azaltarak gemiyi zarar görmekten korur.
Seramit kaplama, tüm taraflarda 5'er puanlık hasarı yadsıyarak ve iç yangınlardan alınan hasarı %50 azaltarak gemiyi zarar görmekten korur.

languages.text: Las placas de ceramita protegen la nave contra el daño, negando 5 puntos de daño a cada lado y reduciendo en un −50 % el daño infligido por los {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendios internos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} by −50%.

traits.locale_text: Las placas de ceramita protegen la nave contra el daño, negando 5 puntos de daño a cada lado y reduciendo en un −50 % el daño infligido por los incendios internos.

languages.text: 陶钢船板可保护舰船免受伤害，每侧可抵消5点伤害，{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火灾{/g}造成的伤害降低50%。
languages.original_text: Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} by −50%.

traits.locale_text: 陶钢船板可保护舰船免受伤害，每侧可抵消5点伤害，内部火灾造成的伤害降低50%。

languages.text: Le revêtement en céramite protège le vaisseau en annulant 5 points de dégâts de chaque côté. Il réduit également de −50 % les dégâts infligés par les {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendies internes{/g}.
languages.original_text: Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} by −50%.

traits.locale_text: Le revêtement en céramite protège le vaisseau en annulant 5 points de dégâts de chaque côté. Il réduit également de −50 % les dégâts infligés par les incendies internes.

languages.text: セラマイトのプレートは船を危険から守り、各側方の5ダメージを無効にし、{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}船内火災{/g}によって生じるダメージを-50%低下させる。
languages.original_text: Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} by −50%.

traits.locale_text: セラマイトのプレートは船を危険から守り、各側方の5ダメージを無効にし、船内火災によって生じるダメージを-50%低下させる。
セラマイトのプレートは船を危険から守り、各側方の5ダメージを無効にし、船内火災によって生じるダメージを-50%低下させる。

languages.text: Ceramit-Beschichtung schützt das Raumschiff, wehrt 5 Schaden auf jeder Seite ab und reduziert den Schaden durch {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}interne Brände{/g} um -50 %.
languages.original_text: Ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 5 damage on each side and reducing the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} by −50%.

traits.locale_text: Ceramit-Beschichtung schützt das Raumschiff, wehrt 5 Schaden auf jeder Seite ab und reduziert den Schaden durch interne Brände um -50 %.
